description.value:
Can be filled with earth to provide basic protection (Cover AP: 4), or alternatively filled with clothing to make a rough pillow.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 4 T
